title: Businessweek Extra-Abigail Disney
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra-Abigail Disney
description:
Abigail Disney, Documentary Filmmaker at Fork Films, discusses her call for a new worker-first era at Disney and all corporations.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
